title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.2 - Track length
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.2 - Track length

State Regulations

Races at distances shorter than 440 yards in length may
be run, and races at longer distances up to 870 yards may be run, without the
prior written approval of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
